title: trusted placs isn't working. Still have to fingerprint to open, already updated location & software
content:
I can't get the phone to stay unlocked at home.  I tried setting trusted places with my home from my google account, I tried updating the software, and updating the location in trusted settings by moving the pin around, and restarting the phone.   Location services is on.  This is extremely frustrating.

I am having other issues as well,  which I'll only mention because they might be related. no one can hear me after I've been on hold for a while and calls start to sound garbled if i walk into my kitchen, but only sometimes.  Happens on LTE and on wifi calling, speakerphone and non-speakerphone.
